version_description:
Choose an easier way down the mountain. With the new EASY mode you can now select how hard the obstacle course will be at the beginning of each game.
Tons of characters have also been added. There are also a few secret ones that you can only unlock by playing with certain characters.

Full list of changes:
- Easy mode
- 50 new missions
- Your progress gets saved in the cloud automatically
- 22 new characters :
---- 4 SECRET characters
---- 3 red carpet characters
- New control schemes :
---- You can now control the center of left and right tap
---- Swipe your way down the mountain
- Localizations for Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified, Russian and Arabic
- Reward videos added
- Minor bugfixes

- Minor bug fixes
- Updated cross promo
Fixed a minor issue with the prize wheel
- Fixed an issue with some of the particle effects
